author: ritchiem
msg: Change CPG initialization log message to notice level.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2085 : Revert the addition of APPEND. We should use a rolling file appender instead.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1816 : When client fails over due to an error, that error is still held bt the StateManager and will prvent the connection from working. During failover check and see if the Connection had been marked closed if so remove any set exception.

author: ritchiem
msg: r817742 (the fix for QPID-2102) did not cover the case for 2pc transactions recovered in the prepared state; this fixes that case.
